participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Passionate about vintage cars and enjoys the simplicity of country life. Loves spending time outdoors and is friendly and approachable.
participant_1.background: i like to work on vintage cars. i own two vintage mustangs. i like to go to country concerts on weekends. my favorite music is country. i have two dogs.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and sociable, always eager to try new cuisines and share experiences. Has a vibrant personality and loves exploring.
participant_2.background: i have been trying all types of food everywhere i go. hey there i'm 23 and i love food. i've been traveling the world for a years. i also like to cook but i'm not very good at it. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i'm not using it.
